mapper.update: update t_water set watPlace = #{watPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, watQuantity = #{watQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, watMonth = #{watMonth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, watYear = #{watYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, watPlaceType = #{watPlaceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where watId = #{watId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select watId, watPlace, watQuantity, watMonth, watYear, watPlaceType from t_water where watPlace = #{watPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and watMonth = #{watMonth,jdbcType=INTEGER} and watYear = #{watYear,jdbcType=INTEGER} and watPlaceType = #{watPlaceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select watId, watPlace, watQuantity, watMonth, watYear, watPlaceType from t_water
